planet.name: COCONUTS-2 b
WISEPA J075108.79-763449.6 b
planet.description: COCONUT-2b is the second coldest directly imaged exoplanet. The acronym COCONUT stands for COol Companions ON Ultrawide orbiTS. Archival data from ASAS-SN, Evryscope, KELT, and SuperWASP reveal a prominent apsidal motion of the binary orbit, caused by the dynamical interactions between the binary and the planet. The system is accessible for high-resolution spectroscopic observations, e.g. Rossiter-McLaughlin effect and transit spectroscopy.
